text: The Searchers is a 1956 epic western movie set in Texas in the 1860s. it is directed by John Ford and starring John Wayne, about a man looking for his niece who was taken by Native Americans. It is also one of the movies that influenced Star Wars. == Other websites == * Category:1956 movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies set in the 19th century Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about Native Americans Category:United States National Film Registry movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: The Searchers
